replies.body: Suddenly your farming skills go from bronze to diamond...

{{champion:89}} pillow fight?
{{champion:44}} YOU KNOW IT!

*Meanwhile in jungle*
 {{champion:33}} This is my moment, the moment to gank, I'LL GET YOU FED TARIC! RAHHHHHH!!!!
*Top lane responds with teleport*
{{champion:54}} It's time

*Adcs decide that no, they don't want to be a part of the wet noodle party*
The first half is exactly what happens when I play.
I fucking love me some tank on tank action, man.

Tanks are like noodles.

Sure, they may seem straight, *until they're wet.*
Hey hey hey, Taric has really high damage output if he has mana. Some of the best 1v1 dueling potential in the game.
Taric's noodle may be wet, but he can swing that noodle so fast that it can really hurt.
It turns into mortal kombat.
